website_summaries.verdict: Comfy to begin with, but features a dial that lets you adjust the fit for custom protection and comfort.
pros: Dial system allows you to fine-tune the fit to eliminate slipping or release pressure
Shields with an exterior ABS shell and EPS foam padding the inside
Available in 3 sizes and many colors
Certified according to CTC and ASTM standards for a number of tough outdoor sports
cons: The chin strap is a source of frustration for some - fraying and difficulty adjusting are repeat complaints

customer_reviews.title: plastic chin clasp broke & Flybar replaced the helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas. He really liked it but it didn’t last - the plastic clasp under his chin cracked, then broke all together. I don’t think he wore it more than 6 times (& that’s being generous) before it broke. He is one unhappy camper . *Edit* changed my review to 5 starts. After contact Flybar customer service directly they made it right. I sent an email with some pictures showing the issue and they immediately offered to send another. That's the kind of company I like to spend my money with.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet D.

customer_reviews.title: Questionable longevity — check the strap integrity regularly!
customer_reviews.text: The helmet itself was a good fit and quite well made / sturdy, but within 18 months the straps on both sides ‘dissolved’ at the points where they met the helmet (see photo) simply as the helmet was being put on. It was never left in the rain and my daughter wore it approximately 40 times during that period. I would be concerned that if the strap integrity is that questionable, the helmet could separate from them during a collision. I’m glad we didn’t discover this flaw under such critical circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Beemer903

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I use this helmet for riding on my electric skateboards. It is rugged and keeps me safe on my rides. I took a basic bike light and clipped it through one of the holes on the front. This helmet is good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Symonds

customer_reviews.title: Flybar dual certified helmet
customer_reviews.text: It was important to me that the next helmets I purchased for my kids, who are starting to go to skateparks and doing tricks on their scooters, be ASTM certified as well as CPSC certified. In my research, it seems that the ASTM certification is more rigorous. This helmet is solid, well made, and comfortable with plenty of padding. It may be a bit on the heavy side, but not much. It also looks great and was a good value for the quality of the product. Happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erin J

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is a super buy. It's lightweight and easily adjustable. The close fit is comfortable and breathable, plus it looks great. Both my kids love the feel of the helmet and are able to adjust the helmet themselves without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jarrell

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I was little skeptical with this order cuz wasn't finding any reviews about adults using this item. All is for their kids reviews but im 29 years old and got e scooter to get around in cuz work just few blocks from where i work. Helmet fit great and really like the padding in it, super comfortable and black one is super dark
customer_reviews.author: Bandit4life

customer_reviews.title: I love it, this product is pretty cool and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it, this product is pretty cool and it looks good for adults. I am using it for my electrical scooter in new york. I think you can have an adjustment for go pro camera and on the back lights for nights when you need ride in busy city like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Parra

customer_reviews.title: looks super well made, and very protective. doesn't fit too well if you have a big head.
customer_reviews.text: this is a cool looking helmet. i like the matte blue, i like the wrap-around(?) feature where it looks like it will protect the back of my head better than those tear-drop thistle looking helmets. it looks well made. all that is just great, if you have a normal sized head. on my wife, this thing sits down low, just barely clearing her ears and looks great. on MY big noggin, it rides up awkwardly high over my ears and looks like a mushroom cap. i should mention this thing has 1" thick styrofoam under the plastic shell, so it REALLY adds some height to your noggin.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: better for skates
customer_reviews.text: i bought this because i dont like the nerdy regular bicycle helmets with the little flap in front and thought this looked a lot cooler. well now i know why those bicycle helmets have that.. because if i go fast with this helmet, the air whoooshes into my ears a bit. it's a nice fitting helmet, great strap and a nice hard shell on it that ifeel safe with, but if you're going to ride really fast get a real cycling helmet, or at least cover your ears with something soft. looks great though!
customer_reviews.author: Darth Bawl

customer_reviews.title: Won't fit large heads well. Too small.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a well built product and has stylish design. But the L-XL barely fits my head and the chin strap extended all the way barely clips under my chin. I wear a 7 3/8 fitted cap so my head isn't too big so I don't understand why the largest size won't fit comfortably. I would buy it again it the L-XL was true to the sizing and if the chin strap was longer and better designed.
customer_reviews.author: Username

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. The graphic is cool and seems like it will hold up well. The helmet feels sturdy. However, even though I ordered the correct size based on my son's head measurement, this is so large it slides forward and back several inches, even with the straps secured. It mentions in the instructions to add more pads if this is the case, but none are provided. This helmet is useless to us, despite ordering the proper size based on the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I can't fault the helmet, I guess. I have a good bit of hair. It's thick and very curly. I could not get this thing on comfortably. I measured and used the guidelines, but this helmet squeezed my head so bad. I can't imagine skating in it without having a headache after. I only walked around for about 10 minutes before I took it off. Then the interior bits got stuck in my hair for good measure, I guess. I sent it back pretty much immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha G

customer_reviews.title: The dial in the back makes it easy for him to adjust the fit
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 years old, I got him a medium and it fits perfectly. The dial in the back makes it easy for him to adjust the fit. It seems like it has a little room for him to grow as he gets older. The design is cool, which is a must or he won't wear it. He said it's lighter than others we tried, comfortable, and allows his head to breath. The only knock I have is there isn't a red one, his favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Chinese junk
customer_reviews.text: There is so much generic Chinese crap on Amazon, Flybar has a legit website and so I had high hopes...nope. Made in China with a manufacture date in 2016 - helmets are only good for 3-7 years depending on who you ask. Also, this says adult or child - these are sized for children. I got a large, it barely fit my 10 year old.
customer_reviews.author: berserkr

customer_reviews.title: My son has a small head for an 8 year ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has a small head for an 8 year old and never likes the way anything feels. He loves the look and feel of this helmet. He sometimes forgets he has it on. There is plenty of room to to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Checkmate57

customer_reviews.title: Functions well, don't assume you will get color you ordered.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet fits well and serves it purpose. Disappointed because we ordered the blue one and received a black one with a yellow guy doing pogo. Too much effort to return it so now my wife scooters around with a helmet that doesn't match her outfit #firstworldproblem
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: He enjoys wearing it and the adjustable band is incredibly helpful for making it a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Size small fit our 3.5 year old quite well. He enjoys wearing it and the adjustable band is incredibly helpful for making it a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: palmeater

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, stylish, kids wear them with no reminders from mom and dad.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old twin grandsons love these helmets! We purchased the camouflage and black/cloud design, both boys loved the look. They both made positive comments about the ability to tighten the helmets and they fit their heads without sliding around. I liked the overall fit, the helmets cover the upper forehead and back of the head. We live in the south, it is late summer and hot, both boys are wearing their helmets daily with no reminders. Total success!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Shipp

customer_reviews.title: She found it comfortable. I hope to never find out how it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the style my 11 year old granddaughter wanted for biking, skating and riding her electric scooter. It fit very well once the straps were adjusted. She found it comfortable. I hope to never find out how it acts in terms of impact protection but will say it seems sturdy and protective. The bottom line is that she loves it and therefore, so do I.
customer_reviews.author: M Weidner

customer_reviews.title: Triathlon Approved
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my old bike helmet was expired (who knew that was a thing!) and I wanted something a little cuter than a traditional bike helmet. This was TTS according to the chart and was comfortable. I wore it for 2 months training for and participating in a sprint triathlon with no issues. The plastic on the top did start to peel a bit when I took my triathlon sticker off the front but I don't think this would be an issue if you are not sticking sticker to it and removing constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this helmet, after returning a helmet to a local sports store. I wasn’t satisfied with my first helmet purchase, as the style was not to my liking. My friend suggested this brand and helmet, because the variety of colors were available and in my size and guess what, the style! So I ordered, and I am 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: I’ll keep on buying this brand.
customer_reviews.text: I feel my kid is protected with this helmet, so I can say that This is a must buy item. The blue shell is hard and it gives little on contact; this means that on a hard hit the shell will absorbe the hit dispersing it around the helmet and contact points protecting the head.. The shell covers well. The construction shows a layer of pads ( contacting the iser head) , the foam, and then the shell.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Frayinig chin strap
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter. Mostly because it was pink. Gotta have everything pink. She only had it a week (maybe 8 hours total wear time) and the chinstrap started fraying. Not sure if hers was a defect or what but we returned it and bought her a Triple 8 helmet instead. The Triple 8 was a couple bucks more but when it comes to safety its a small price to pay.
customer_reviews.author: Barry dog

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I have larger head, but not a giant odd-shaped gourd or anything. I measured my circumference at 22.25" but even at the widest setting this L/XL helmet was too snug, front to back. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Clark

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Well Constructed Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I like the artwork outside and padding inside the helmet. The only drawback is the sizing. I have a 7 1/4 (USA) size head and thought the L/XL would be too large. So, I ordered the M/L - which just barely fits my head. Pretty snug, but not an issue enough to return. It would be good if the sizing chart was more clear.
customer_reviews.author: AZ-Coug

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and very protective. Adjustable head piece in the back of the helmet makes allows for a secure and comfortable fit. Ordered this for my 10 almost 11year old son.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable on four year old
customer_reviews.text: A little bit disappointed with this helmet. I bought it for my four year old and ordered the size that he needed... However it is very uncomfortable on and hurts the back of his head to the point that he just loosens it and we end up taking it off. I knew it wasn't going to be the best helmet because of the price, but it had good reviews so I thought I would give it a try. Total bummer on his birthday. Going to try to look for something different
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sits high on the head, even with thick pads removed
customer_reviews.text: The color is great, the fit is not great. I usually wear a small/medium helmet but this fit too small-town it sat too high on my head. I will try & sell it and will not be purchasing the bigger size for these reasons: It has thick, velvety padding- while soft & snuggly- would be too hot while skating in the summer. The helmet is quite bulbous too, and looks a bit funny on our heads!
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Picture Lord Helmet from Spaceballs.  The helmet fits snugly using the dial to fit, but the shell is enormous and looks ridiculo
customer_reviews.text: Picture Lord Helmet from Spaceballs. The helmet fits snugly using the dial to fit, but the shell is enormous and looks ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne greene

customer_reviews.title: Runs large but nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: The helmet itself is great. Super sturdy and my son loves the look of it. The reason for 4 stars is it ran bigger than I expected. I measured my son’s head and followed the chart for ordering and when we got it it was very large. Luckily we had some thick padding on an old helmet that I could use to make it work.
customer_reviews.author: I like stuff

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Skid Lid!
customer_reviews.text: Fits really well, adjustable via both the chin strap with a handy velcro catch to keep the lead in place, and has a fantastic ratchet on the back to snug it up against your head. Ventilated well, and I can say from personal experience, takes a good solid beating.
customer_reviews.author: Wookie Rage

customer_reviews.title: No doubt it will keep me safe.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is solid. I thankfully haven't fallen, but I have complete faith this helmet will keep me safe if I do. There is a ton of padding on the interior and the outer shell is a tank. Only complaint is I apparently have a huge head, so even the biggest size sits a little awkwardly on my dome.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well but looks funny around head
customer_reviews.text: I really I liked how this fit but when I looked at myself in the mirror, look unquestionably large around my head. I also felt a little bit off-balance when I went lean to the side. All in all I did like how this helmet fit but it just looked weird because of how big it was, I was going to use this for a bike ride but I‘m going to return this and getting slimmer Arrow dynamic helmet. (I did make sure to measure my head before ordering)
customer_reviews.author: isamarathoner

customer_reviews.title: Great all around helmet.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting a whole lot when I bought this, and when I got it I found out it's a pretty nice helmet. Fit is comfortable and it adjusts easily, light, and somewhat low profile. Sure not like the helmets of the past!
customer_reviews.author: Lubbz

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a good quality design.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my kids heads 3 to 7 yrs old with room to grow. size s/m. Very durable. The air flow design is perfect for sweaty kids and comfortable. Highly recommend and worth the price. Going to buy more soon for younger ones. Kids look great in them too which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Redd

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, fits larger brained peeps
customer_reviews.text: Finally, after numerous attempts, I found a bike helmet that fits, and is fashionable enough (well, as helmets much go); The blue color matches my bike nicely. Highly recommend for people who have large brain buckets :-)
customer_reviews.author: Shelbea

customer_reviews.title: Totally functional and well fitting helmet that looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is ultra bulky and tall looking. I'm a form over function person by a wide margin but this is just too much. I'll use it until I find a suitable alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for 11yr old and 13yr old. Very sturdy and is the perfect fit for the boys. Also adjustable so they will be able to use it until it falls apart. Most importantly it provides great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_customer

customer_reviews.title: 15 Months. Fantastic fit for son. Wish made XXL for me.
customer_reviews.text: 15 months, minor scratches, very happy. Using standard cap sizing and size charts I ordered the M-L for my 11 yr old. I love helmets with back adjustment knob. Just secures the helmet so perfectly. Venting looked like the best I could find. Added some reflective tape and it’s 10! He’s going to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect helmet - fine tune adjustability
customer_reviews.text: Protect your noggin in style with this helmet. It has everything you need - is solid and clean looking - also very comfortable. The back has an adjustable strap with a dial that allows you to set the helmet to just the right size. I bought an XL for me, and a L for my sun for our skateboarding adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smedley

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got this helmet for riding my electric scooter from the train to work and back, about 8 miles a day. It is comfortable and easy to adjust. There is a little wheel on t the back strap to loosen or tighten the fit so on cold days I can wear a thin cap underneath to keep my shaved head warm.
customer_reviews.author: RASREVIEW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic helmet. I added reflective stickers to mine for late afternoon hour biking. Very comfortable. A little bit warm when wearing in the hot weather. Could have more ventilation holes.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been wearing this helmet as much as I should be but it seems to be well constructed. The design is a bit tacky to be honest. Bought the Large and was able to fit the helmet onto my 13 and 15 year cousins due to how adjustable the helmet was.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Product,  slow prime shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet, the problem is 10 days Shipping on a listed Prime item. Amazon prime memberships should be prorated will the Covid 19 excuses are going on! Let's see some free speech and publish this honest amazon review.
customer_reviews.author: Sg

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet to start with for sports
customer_reviews.text: Cool helmet, I haven’t had many spills but the ones I did. It kept me safe. I’m not a skater but if you are going to start wearing a helmet with a sport be it biking, electric scooters, skiing, snowboarding ect this is a good one to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice helment
customer_reviews.text: I like the helmet it is very light weight. I use it when ridding my bicycle. I ordered a XL the box was marked Xl but the helmet was a large. I returned it, recorded and the second time it was a XL.
customer_reviews.author: L. Herren

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: She said it's very comfortable and much better than her previous hellokitty helmet. She did mention it's slightly heavy so took one star off the "light weight" division.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zheng

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: This fit my husbands big head, a little off looking, but sure enough he crashed on his EUC and fell on his head. He got 20 stitches and a concussion, due to him falling on his forhead and top of his head, but he survived thanks to this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It's not perfect but...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is pretty fair. A lot of reviewers bashing the product but seriously, it's a sub-$50 helmet. If you want a premium quality helmet be prepared to pay over $100. For me, this is just what I need to go roller blading once a day. It's light, it fits and I have enough faith it will protect my cranium. For $30 it's what I expected and am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Very good helmet and well made! Bought this for my son... skateboard, bike and pogo stick. He loves it and fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny P

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for bike riding
customer_reviews.text: I decided during Covid that I wanted a new helmet to wear while bike riding. Ive been wearing this one on my rides for a few months now and its extremely comfortable easy to wear and looks good. I like the look and feel of this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Stockermann family

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointing but will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Looks a bit clunky on your head. It's light but in a cheap way. Straps don't provide a multi direction fit and the inside fit for me was tighter than expected based on the measurement guide.
customer_reviews.author: George T.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, wrong color received.
customer_reviews.text: I like the helmet; the only reason I’d be dissatisfied is because I ordered Black, but received more of a Cyan color. I’m not sure how the mix up came about, but definitely not ideal: The reason for 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: MinnieX3

customer_reviews.title: buy this helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best and most comfortable and well made helmet I have ever put on... thank you for making such a wonderful product..
customer_reviews.author: muffin

customer_reviews.title: Son says it's comfortable and he doesn't mind putting it on
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son with his first skateboard. It fits him well and it gives me some peace of mind. It is a little wide, but my 9-year-old says it's comfortable and he doesn't mind putting it on. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Isherwood

customer_reviews.title: Just the ticket
customer_reviews.text: I had cheap styrofoam based helmets before, for biking and jogging. They were light, which was excellent. But after a couple of bumped noggins I knew that I needed sturdier protection. This helmet is heavier, but still light, and will be much safer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one I have bought. Got a pink for one daughter, a grey for another, and black for me. We use these when we go rollerblading. Sturdy, not cheap looking, and fits wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: D. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Protection
customer_reviews.text: my grandson loved this gift. looks just like what his dad wears on the ERT for the sheriff's dept. My grandson is play street hockey and loves the fit, it is adjustable. Loves the looks and so he says; plays better with it.
customer_reviews.author: bob4life

customer_reviews.title: Ice skating
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 4yr who is taking ice skating lessons. Fits good at its smallest setting. She doesn’t complain about fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: R. Forte

customer_reviews.title: Fits my fat head
customer_reviews.text: My head is a little bigger than 24 inches, but I was able to make this work. I pulled out all the velcro and padding other than the part in front that sits against your forehead. It’s very comfortable and the venting keeps you cool during hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This One Has It All
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? I love the fit,the light weight and my camo color! Very well made and study and easy to adjust for exact fit.
customer_reviews.author: terry walker

customer_reviews.title: Chin strap
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty decent helmed for money you pay.pretty comfortable light and fits my pretty big head only one concern chin strap should b little longer .otherwise I’ll recommend for everyone ....one less star for this strap
customer_reviews.author: tomasz dzbikowicz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality helmet, but a little tight.
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old son loves this helmet, but it runs a little small. He could have probably used a size bigger, but we ordered based on his measurements. Measure carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool and Fits well
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet...I especially like the ability to tighten using the knob on the back. My son is 7 and I got him the small and he says is is super comfortable to wear when riding his bike.
customer_reviews.author: RWellins

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Design wise, it looks as good in real as expected. It's very light and comfortable. Choosing the right size could be a bit tricky though. If in between sizes I suggest you go with the larger size as it's easier to adjust down than up.
customer_reviews.author: Diégo Brunot

customer_reviews.title: light weight
customer_reviews.text: Light weight & breathable. Perfect size for my 12 yr old son, I bought size M/L. Helmet can be tightened by using dial to adjust comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Helmet! After buying multiple different helmets this one ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Helmet! After buying multiple different helmets this one is definitely a winner! It fits perfectly, doesnt need to keep being adjusted like our last helmet needed to, and is comfortable. Very happy with this purchase & price. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this helmet! It is solid, adjustable for custom fit, looks awesome on my 10 year old, he says it is so comfortable he doesn't even realize he is wearing one (and he is PICKY!) and has great padding on the inside...If you're on the fense about buying this rest assured you won't regret it!! Size wise he is an average 10 year old and the M/L fit him perfectly with room to grow!!
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Don't like how it fits
customer_reviews.text: I look and feel like a giant mushroom head wearing this helmet. Its also a little uncomfortable as parts of the velcro get exposed and scratch your skull and forehead (I shave my head)
customer_reviews.author: George I.

customer_reviews.title: Let down by the high ratings.
customer_reviews.text: Not as exciting of a product as everyone rated it. The Large size on this product was about 1/2 inch too small for me and the chin strap is at the end of its length with no further adjustment available.
customer_reviews.author: M-Diddy

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be OK, not tested it for impacts though :-)
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, seems to do the job, but I have not tried letting my kid hit his head on anything, for obvious reasons(!) so I cannot tell if it really works as intended, but it looks like it should.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Great for skateboarders
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it: it looks cool, it's light weight, easy to dial in just the right fit, and the price is right. It's especially handy in that he can fit it right into his school backpack too.
customer_reviews.author: Doug BowkerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: So I like it but my tween does not
customer_reviews.text: So I like it but my tween does not. Says it wont allow her to have a proper ponytail... Guess I shouldve looked harder. She was also not impressed with the pink color....lol. But she will have an intact head. :P
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality. Buyer aware.
customer_reviews.text: This one has poor quality. The clips came out of the belt. I don't recommend this product. I purchased this on Jun 23. It broke within 2 months. Now returned window is closed and can't return.
customer_reviews.author: Gowrishankar

customer_reviews.title: Not prompt, but decent.
customer_reviews.text: The color I was delivered was light grey and not Black like the item ordered, but fit my head reasonably well with some adjustment. The chin strap required some modification to fit, as there wasn't enough length to adjust for an XL sized head. Overall, I give a grade C for both quality and fit and finish.
customer_reviews.author: ERock

customer_reviews.title: light blue color amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of this helmet. It is more a periwinkle blue, than light blue. Gorgeous. Great helmet, feels light on the head...sometimes, I even forget to take it off. Has an adjustable sizing mechanism in the back to get a perfect fit,
customer_reviews.author: mugsyrx

customer_reviews.title: I love how light weight this helmet is!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I bought a white and a blue helmet for my two girls for Figure Skating and it fits great! We just followed the measurement chart and it fit perfectly! I also love how light weight these helmets are and how well made they are. I have three girls ages 9-8 & 4 and they all wear a size S/M. I will be buying another one for our 8 year old as well. I hope this helps anyone! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: For the price these helmets are pretty awesome. Fit is right on and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these helmets are pretty awesome. Fit is right on and I love how they can adjust to fit different size heads.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My two boys seem to like them. My older boy has had his for allot longer and it is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Parks

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a Rock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet just incase I may need it, use once , fit my large head just right, satisfy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ian Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Safe fit
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet. Stays properly positioned during his rides. Holds its appearance over time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Ok for 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: The helmet looks pretty big for a my 10 year old. But it looks better than most of the helmets out there.
customer_reviews.author: Truong Fam

customer_reviews.title: My 10 and 13 year old love the helmet
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks cool and stays on easily. Strap is easy for kids to work. We really like this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Tune Luke

customer_reviews.title: I like the graphics and the construction of this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I like the graphics and the construction of this helmet. It fits correctly but just looks really large on my noggin. However, it does the job. Padding on the inside is about 1” thick.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Paris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality helmet
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son wears this and actually likes wearing it. He fell a few times with this on and was glad he had it on! Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Patti K.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Safety
customer_reviews.text: Good looking helmet; grandson loves it and I love that it is safe! Win - Win!
customer_reviews.author: ltyanet

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Well made and good fit. I like it! But maybe should have picked white color!
customer_reviews.author: Deev

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for my 8 years old
customer_reviews.text: It fits great and quite comfortable. The only issue is the chin strap that pinches skin sometimes when locking.
customer_reviews.author: JJ's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: What folks need to keep in mind is, the helmet is adjustable and they need to make it fit per their head size.
customer_reviews.author: Mister BB

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to
customer_reviews.text: My son did not like the adjustable inner piece. He also did not like the yellow graphics, and spray painted over it. Fits good, and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Don’t know how well it protects and hopefully won’t need to find out by falling. Easy to adjust fitting
customer_reviews.author: onecupper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 12 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute (a.k.a. “Cool”). Will protect my kid’s head. I’m happy!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves this
customer_reviews.text: His old bike helmet was for a "baby". His words, not mine. Since he is really in to playing army, this is perfect. He even wears it when he's not riding his bike.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet
customer_reviews.text: The padding is great and fits well. Got a small for my 7-8 year old son and it works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit but not bad either
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to fit my head quite right. My head is round maybe it fits a square head better. Cool design.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nugget

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and good air flow.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and light enough. Very breathable. Graphics look clean. Strap is easy to set and unlatch. I haven't crash tested thankfully but it does look like it would do a great job absorbing an impact.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this design
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this design. But what's key, if you want your money's worth, is the adjustable ring in the back. I had originally bought a Critical Cycles helmet for my 11-yr old daughter, whose head size is 53.5 cm. It was way too wide. The adjustable ring will allow her to grow with this helmet for years, I imagine. It's made like a ski helmet. Good quality. Nice color.
customer_reviews.author: A. Steinberger

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for hat size 7 5/8
customer_reviews.text: Unclear sizing - way to small for hat size 7 5/8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: The adjustment wheel allowed a good fit and the chin strap holds it comfortably in place. Mine came with pogo stick silhouettes on it which fits with the intended use :-)
customer_reviews.author: Aerostation

customer_reviews.title: Flybar helmets
customer_reviews.text: The sizes run small n I ordered med. n it was too small even though my head isn't that big they just run small so I got the XL n was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Gitano34

product_meta.title: Flybar Skateboard Helmet- Dual Certified CPSC Multi-Sport Impact Protection for Youth and Adults for Bike, Inline and Roller Skating, Skateboarding, BMX, Scooter, and Sports Activities
feature_bullets: NEW FLYBAR DUAL CERTIFIED HELMETS: All our helmets are CPSC & ASTM Safety Certified for bicycling, BMX, roller and inline skating, aggressive/trick skateboarding, scooter, pogoing, and a number of other multi-sports activities

STRONG ABS OUTER SHELL & EPS FOAM INNER LINING: Made of high-quality ABS shell, high-density EPS foam inner shell, the Flybar Dual Certified Helmet protects you from potentially harmful impact while engaging in sports

9 DIFFERENT COLORS AND DESIGNS: Whether you want a cool printed design or a simple solid matte color, every helmet offers the same trustworthy safety certified protection to keep both kids and adults safe during multi-sports activities. 12 wide stylish vents on each Flybar Helmet provide even air flow to keep cool during active sports sessions

AVAILABLE IN 3 SIZES: S/M (53-55cm/20.8-21.6in); M/L (55-58cm/21.6-22.8in); L/XL (58-61cm/22.8-24in). For a perfect fit, measure the circumference of your head starting in the middle of your forehead to ensure you choose the correct size
ADJUSTABLE FIT: The Flybar Dual Certified Helmets feature an adjustable spin dial on the back of the helmet to ensure a perfect and safe fit
